Get all the answers

What is WoCap and how can it help my company as a Supplier?

WoCap is a marketplace that will help you unlock your working capital today. With a few clicks you can sign up, select your outstanding invoices that you would like to accelerate today and…. get paid!

WoCap connects Buyers with their existing Suppliers enabling mutually beneficial transactions.

How do I get started?

Super simple! Click on the “Join now” button on our website and create your account hassle free. Alternatively, you can simply click on the smart invitation link you have received from your respective Buyer.

If you need further assistance, you can schedule a meeting with one of our agents.

What does it cost to use WoCap?

There is zero cost for Suppliers to use WoCap, it is simply a tool that you can use voluntarily according to your company’s needs.

Is there a demo?

For sure there is! We can provide you with a taste of the WoCap experience and if you wish to go through this with one of our experts, we can arrange that for you!

Unlock your Working Capital today

Join WoCap and explore the new smart way of releasing cash flow in a few clicks
